column1: # Required | A unique ID for the item. Use the SKU if you can. Enter each ID only once or the item won't upload. For dynamic ads; this ID must exactly match the content ID for the same item in your Facebook pixel. Character limit: 100.
column2: # Required | A specific; relevant title for the item. Include keywords like brand; attributes or condition. Character limit: 150.
column3: # Required | A short; relevant description of the item. Include specific or unique product features like material or color. Use plain text and don't enter text in all capital letters. Character limit: 5;000.
column4: # Required | The current availability of the item in your store. | Supported values: in stock; available for order; preorder; out of stock; discontinued
column5: # Required | The quantity of this item in your inventory. People can't buy this item unless the inventory is 1 or higher. Note: In a Page shop; an item will show as out of stock if inventory is 0; even if its availability is 'in stock'.
column6: # Required | The condition of the item. | Supported values: new; refurbished; used
column7: # Required | The cost and currency of the item. The price is a number followed by the 3-digit currency code (ISO 4217 standards). Use a period (".") as the decimal point.
column8: # Required | The URL of the specific product page where people can buy the item. If you don't have a URL; provide a fallback; like a link to your Facebook business Page.
column9: # Required | The URL for the main image of your item. Use a square (1:1) format image with a resolution of 1024 x 1024 pixels or higher.
column10: # Required | The brand name; unique manufacturer part number (MPN) or Global Trade Item Number (GTIN) of the item. You only need to enter one of these; not all of them. For GTIN; enter the item's UPC; EAN; JAN or ISBN. Character limit: 100.
column11: # Optional | The Google product category for the item. Learn more about product categories: https://www.facebook.com/business/help/526764014610932. Provide a category in either the fb_product_category field or google_product_category field; or both.
column12: # Optional | The Facebook product category for the item. Learn more about product categories: https://www.facebook.com/business/help/526764014610932. Provide a category in either the fb_product_category field or google_product_category field; or both.
column13: # Optional | The discounted price and currency of the item if it's on sale. The price is a number followed by the currency code (ISO 4217 standards). Use "." as the decimal point. A sale price is required if you want to use an overlay for discounted prices.
column14: # Optional | The time range for your sale period; including the date; time and time zone when your sale starts and ends. If you don't enter sale dates; any items with a sale_price will remain on sale until you remove their sale price. Use this format: YYYY-MM-DDT23:59+00:00/YYYY-MM-DDT23:59+00:00. Enter the start date as YYYY-MM-DD. Enter a 'T'. Then; enter the start time in 24-hour format (00:00 to 23:59) followed by the UTC time zone (-12:00 to +14:00). Enter a '/' and then repeat the same format for your end date and time. The example row below uses the PST time zone (-08:00).
column15: # Optional | If the item is a variant; use this column to enter the same group ID for all variants within the same product group. For example; Blue Facebook T-Shirt is a variant of Facebook T-Shirt. Facebook will select one variant to show from each product group based on relevance or popularity. Character limit: 100.
column16: # Optional | The gender of a person that the item is targeted towards. | Supported values: female; male; unisex
column17: # Optional | The color of the item. Use one or more words to describe the color; not a hex code. Character limit: 200.
column18: # Optional | The size of the item written as a word; abbreviation or number; such as small; XL or 12. Character limit: 200.
column19: # Optional | The age group that the item is targeted towards. | Supported values: adult; all ages; infant; kids; newborn; teen; toddler
column20: # Optional | The material the item is made from; such as cotton; denim or leather. Character limit: 200.
column21: # Optional | The pattern or graphic print on the item. Character limit: 100.
column22: # Optional | The category the item belongs to according to your business's product categorization system; if you have one. You can also enter a Google product category. Character limit: 1;000.
column23: # Optional | Shipping details for the item; written as: Country:Region:Service:Price. Include the 3-digit ISO currency code in the price. To use the free shipping overlay in your ads; enter the price as 0.0. Use ';' to separate multiple shipping details for different regions or countries. Only people in the specified region or country will see shipping details for that region or country. You can leave out the region (keep the double '::') if your shipping details are the same for an entire country.
column24: # Optional | The shipping weight of the item in lb; oz; g or kg.
column25: # Optional | HTML description using a restricted set of tags

column3: A vibrant blue crewneck T-shirt for all shapes and sizes. Made from 100% cotton.
